heading: Physical Attributes
html: My physique is thin - I don't gain weight easily.

heading: Physical Attributes
html: My skin is usually dry, more so in winter.

heading: Physical Attributes
html: My hands and feet are usually cold.

heading: Physical Attributes
html: My energy fluctuates and comes in bursts.

heading: Physical Attributes
html: I usually develop gas or constipation.

heading: Physical Attributes
html: I usually have difficulty falling asleep or having a sound night's sleep.

heading: Physical Attributes
html: I am uncomfortable in cold weather.
